column2: The Friends cantrip temporarily increases the target's opinion of you, but afterwards they'll realise what you've done and their opinion will go down.
Tried to cast spell on me
The Comprehend Languages minor spell temporarily increases your diplomatic ability.
Open your spellbook to see available spells.
Close your spellbook and access other decisions.

Spells can be cast in two different ways: either through the intrigue screen or via targeted decisions.

While Cantrips can be cast as long as they are not in cooldown, other spells are split into Minor, Moderate and Major categories. Each has a maximum number that can be cast per year based on your class level.

All wizards know a basic set of universal spells and can learn more through research.
